name: Kinaman vs Gray Elephant
description: Hardcore platformer Kinaman vs Gray Elephant. Inspired by the stories of one blogger about childhood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or XP Processor: 1 GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higer Processor: 1,5 GHz CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
